title: How to produce goods and services

content.question: A power company decides to use wind turbines to provide electricity instead of coal. Which basic economic question does this decision answer in a free market economy?

choices.label: What goods or services will be produced?
How will goods or services be produced?
Who will consume the goods or services?
What economic system should be adopted?

content.answer: How will goods or services be produced?

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
